channel.title: Need some couple of developers, EASY TO JOIN. [Nexon-World]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/s3nd5d.png[/img]
TO CONTACT ME: Skype: NexonLTD MSN: Paras-Best@hotmail.com ______________________________________ Hello there, i'm making a RuneScape private server called Nexon-World. If you're interested to join our developevement team please, contact me. You don't have to be very experience on programming, but atleast must know something of it, also we need a bug tester, that tests our updates does they work and try to find most bugs on them. Heres some couple of pictures of it. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/35876kx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2q30u4o.png[/img]
*We need a web designer *We need a bug tester *We need server-sided developer *We need client sided developer More about Nexon-World: Nexon-World will be hosted on a VPS Which means it will be 24/7 online, without any kind of lagg, we've also noticed that when you login to the server it kicks out, well don't worry we've fixed that, and also logging is faster. We will have a website writted on HTML and much more cool stuff; if you're interested CONTACT! We also got Queen Black Dragon, we got Dragonbone items, royal items, Corgis etc. (Revision: 667 Loading 718)

item.title: Need some couple of developers, EASY TO JOIN. [Nexon-World]
item.dc:creator: @cheaphax cheaphax
item.description:
@cheaphax wrote:

TO CONTACT ME:
Skype: NexonLTD
MSN: Paras-Best@hotmail.com

Hello there, i’m making a RuneScape private server called Nexon-World.
If you’re interested to join our developevement team please, contact me.
You don’t have to be very experience on programming, but atleast must know something of it,
also we need a bug tester, that tests our updates does they work and try to find most bugs on them.
Heres some couple of pictures of it.

35876kx.png764×502

2q30u4o.png764×502

*We need a web designer
*We need a bug tester
*We need server-sided developer
*We need client sided developer
More about Nexon-World:
Nexon-World will be hosted on a VPS Which means it will be 24/7 online, without any kind of lagg, we’ve also noticed that
when you login to the server it kicks out, well don’t worry we’ve fixed that, and also logging is faster. We will have a website writted on HTML
and much more cool stuff; if you’re interested CONTACT! We also got Queen Black Dragon, we got Dragonbone items, royal items, Corgis etc. (Revision: 667 Loading 718)
